sys_script_client.description: AddNewItemDescriptionOnChange sets the ReadOnly property of the item_descriptionfield to False if the AddNewItemDescription check box is checked, or True if the check box is uchecked. When the item_description field is set to Not ReadOnly the specified Item Description table can be added to the item description table, if this item description is not already in the table.
sys_script_client.name: AddNewItemDescriptionOnChange
